Key Match Events: Anastasios Bakasetas scored the first goal of the match with a shot that took a deflection
Petros Mantalos scored the second goal of the match after being gifted the ball by Ireland's Caoimhin Kelleher in added time
Pre-Game Insights: Greece came into the game on the back of an emotionally charged 2-1 win over England at Wembley on Thursday
Post-Match Reflections: Greece's winning streak continues with victory over Ireland
Ireland stay third on three points with Finland bottom on zero
Miscellaneous Highlights: The crowd inside the packed Karaiskakis Stadium made plenty of noise to get behind their team
The match was played in Piraeus, Greece, with an attendance of 30,253
Others: The game was a part of the 2024-25 UEFA Nations League, Group Stage
Greece top Group B2 on 12 points, three ahead of second-placed England
